name: Econ 2 Project
description: !!WARNING [MAKE SURE TO PUT IN FULLSCREEN FOR GAME TO WORK PROPPERLY]!! This is a game that I(Avo Estevez) created for my Econ 2 class for a project called "CREATIVE PROJECT" With this game I hope to teach people who don't understand how the GDP(Gross Domestic Product) is calculated, by putting the player in a position where they must calculate it for themselves.
